ResearchProjectDef.defName:
AOTC_GeneProcessorI_Research Stellar Gene Processor Since Starsteel exhibits superconductivity at the comparatively high temperature of -10 celsius, we can use it to improve the power of the quantum processing unit in the Gene Processor. 15000 Ultra
SNS_Research_I

AOTC_GeneProcessorII_Research Cosmic Gene Processor Taking advantage of the Cosmic Matter trapped in Cosmic Alloy, we can double the number of qubits the Gene Processor can manipulate. 25000 Ultra
SNS_Research_II

AOTC_GeneProcessorIII_Research Eternium Gene Processor Because of the exotic properties of Eternium, we can use it in an altogether new process to further increase the processing power of the Gene Processor. 150000 Ultra
SNS_Research_III
